title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 170.14 - State issued identification card
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 170.14 - State issued identification card

State Regulations
(a) A security guard wearing a military style uniform shall prominently display the

State issued registration card on his or her outer garment. (b) A bail enforcement agent or an employee
of a bail enforcement agent wearing a military style uniform shall prominently
display a company issued identification card on his or her outer
garment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
170.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
